body:
Actually, I believe both implementations are slightly different than the one we current have.

Indeed, the current implementation guarantees that we have a specific number of non-zero elements **per row**, while the first implementation proposed here only guarantees a fixed number of non-zero elements **per tensor**. 

I have never used this weight initialization, so I don't know if this makes a difference in practice.
